definitions.body: :Le 15:4 place of lying, couch; act of lying;—abs. ´[[מ]]: 1Ki 1:47 +, cstr. [[מִשְׁכַּב]] 2Sa 4:5 +; sf. [[מִשְׁכָּבִי]] Job 7:13 +, [[מִשְׁכַּבְכֶם]] Ps 4:5; pl. cstr. [[מִשְׁכְּבֵי]] Ge 49:4 +, sf. [[מִשְׁכְּבוֹהָם]] Ho 7:14 +, etc.;—

couch, bed (37 t.), 2Sa 4:11, Ho 7:14, Mic 2:1, 1Ki 1:47, Ct So 3:1 +; ´[[וְנׇפַל לְמ]]: Ex 21:18 (E) he takes to his bed; [[נִדָּתָהּ]] ´[[מ]]: Le 15:26 (P; v. sub I. definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: in gen., ´[[חֲדַר מ]]: chamber of lying down = bed-chamber, Ex 7:28 (E), 2Sa 4:7, 2Ki 6:12, [[בְּחַדְרֵי מִשְׁכָּֽבְךָ]] Ec 10:20; [[הַצָּהֳרַיִם]] ´[[והוּא שׁׂכֵב אֵת מ]]: 2Sa 4:5 his noon-day siesta; 2Sa 17:28 rd. perh. ´[[עַרְשׂת מ]]: couches for lying down Klo Bu HPS Now, cf. LXX.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: (from context) sexually: of woman [[מִשְׁכַּב]] ([[אִישׁ לְ]])[[יׁדַעַת ]] [[זׇכָת]] Ju Jdg 21:11, Jdg 21:12, Nu 31:17, Nu 31:35 (P); of man [[שׁכב מִשְׁכְּבֵי]] [[אִשָּׁה]] Le 18:22, Le 20:13 (+ [[אֶת־זׇכָר]] sodomy; H); ´[[דּׂדִים מ]]: Ez Eze 23:17.
